snippet: Representatives of 118 nations will gather this month in Tehran, a chance for Iran’s leaders to try to reduce their political isolation.
abstract: Representatives of 118 nations will gather for the Nonaligned Movement conference this month in Tehran, giving Iran’s leaders an opportunity to try to reduce their political isolation; Iran says it will unfold plans to revitalize the movement and seek support for its nuclear enrichment program and its resistance to what it calls dominance by the United States.
lead_paragraph: Representatives of 118 nations will gather this month in Tehran, a chance for Iran’s leaders to try to reduce their political isolation.

headline.seo: Iran to Host Nonaligned Movement Meeting and Take Leadership
headline.main: Iran Preparing to Lead Global Nonaligned Group
headline.print_headline: Iran Preparing to Lead Global Nonaligned Group
